title: Agent Response Schema
description: Standardized JSON response format for agents. IMPORTANT: Never use null or none values for fields in the JSON response - completely omit fields that do not apply rather than setting them to null. Only include fields that have actual values.

answer.description: The agent's final response message to a user or agent - when provided, stops the ReAct loop

reasoning.description: A piece of reasoning or thought that can be used as a basis for the next step in the ReAct loop, never use both 'answer' and 'reasoning' in the same response

tool_calls.description: List of tool calls to execute - continues the ReAct loop

tool_name.description: Name of the tool to call

arguments.description: Arguments to pass to the tool as key-value pairs

routing.description: Optional routing information for workflow control. Only include this field when communicating directly with the user or when routing to another agent. Do not include when reasoning.
